rows.label: qev065404_MSG0001
rows.name: Um, [ST:playername ]? Why are you here...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0002
rows.name: Oh well. Doesn't matter. Take a look at this body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0003
rows.name: It's Clemons. ...The real Clemons. Poor guy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'd say time of death was about a week ago. Killed by
the same Definian who set up the ambush, is my guess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_JNK0010
rows.name: Consider

rows.label: qev065404_SEL0011
rows.name: Think about Clemons's time of death.

rows.label: qev065404_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev065404_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Lara Nara how the search for the Definian is going.

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0005
rows.name:
Mmm? What is it? Something stick out to you about
his time of death?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0006
rows.name: Judging by the body, I'm pretty confident in my guess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0007
rows.name:
But if not a week, then it's been here a few days at the
very least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0008
rows.name: Still at large, I'm afraid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0009
rows.name:
But we've got every gate locked down completely.
Rank-and-file resident or leader of the BLADEs,
you're not getting through. She's in here somewhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0010
rows.name:
...Yeeees? You're still staring at me all funny.
Are you coming to a realization here or what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0011
rows.name: Look, even if you're not sure yet, let's hear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_JNK0030
rows.name: Declare

rows.label: qev065404_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that you saw the suspect.

rows.label: qev065404_JNK0040
rows.name: Muse

rows.label: qev065404_SEL0041
rows.name: Try to sum up your thoughts.

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0012
rows.name: What? Where?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0013
rows.name: Why didn't you stop her?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0014
rows.name:
If you keep scrunching your face up like that,
you're going to get wrinkles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0015
rows.name:
Don't worry about solving everything yourself.
Just tell me what you've seen and we can work out
what it means together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0016
rows.name: ...Wait, you talked to Clemons just now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0017
rows.name: It has to have been that nasty Definian...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0018
rows.name:
She knew you hadn't seen this body yet,
so she turned back into Clemons to fool you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0019
rows.name: Rrgh! This is SO infuriating![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0020
rows.name:
We're going to find her! ...Er, him. Whatever!
And then we're going toâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0021
rows.name:
Oops, one second. Emergency message.
...Huuuuuh? What the heck is THIS?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0022
rows.name:
Suriella and Clemons are fighting outside the city!
That Clemons has to be our perp![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0027
rows.name:
I'll head out as soon as I can gear up, but you go on
ahead. They're at the little island west of the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0023
rows.name:
Suriella and Clemons are fighting on the little island to
the west of the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0024
rows.name:
We have no idea what the Definians are capable of,
combat-wise, so I'm going to get some serious gear
together just in case.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0025
rows.name: Go on ahead of me. I'll meet you there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065404_MSG0026
rows.name:
And do NOT let that nasty creature get away.
This mess ends on that island![ST:wait ]
